parameters.query:
=SELECT 
  d.id,
  d.filename,
  d.document_type,
  d.manufacturer,
  d.series,
  d.models,
  d.version,
  d.file_size,
  d.processing_status,
  d.created_at,
  COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as chunk_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as image_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ec.id) as error_code_count
FROM krai_core.documents d
LEFT JOIN krai_intelligence.chunks c ON d.id = c.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_content.images i ON d.id = i.document_id
LEFT JOIN krai_intelligence.error_codes ec ON d.id = ec.document_id
WHERE d.document_type = '{{ $json.document_type }}'
{{ $json.manufacturer ? "AND d.manufacturer ILIKE '%" + $json.manufacturer + "%'" : "" }}
GROUP BY d.id
ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
LIMIT {{ $json.limit || 10 }};
